description:
Rear garden: T1 Cherry Laurel (Prunus laurocerasus)- Reduce by 20-30% to tidy and contain and maintain at 2.5m tall, Final height = 2.5m and final spread = 3m.	
T2 Turkish Hazel (Corylus colurna) - Reduce by 20% to keep at around 4m.  Final height = 4m and final spread = 3m.	
T3 Lawson Cypress (Chamaecyparis lawsoniana)	- Reduce height to around 4m, trim / reduce spread at top to 
shape into reduced height.  Final height = 4m and final spread = 3m.		
T4 Western Red Cedar (Thuja plicata) - Reduce height to around 4m, trim / reduce spread at top to shape into reduced height.  Final height = 4m and final spread = 3m.		
T5 Yew (Taxus baccata) - Reduce height to around 4m, trim / reduce spread at top to shape into reduced height.  Final height = 4m and final spread = 4m.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
